A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was such a break from the tone and mythology of the original movies as well as The Force Awakens\, that I was originally caught off guard. It was also easily the most nail-biting movie of the franchise. Every time you think Johnson is about to take a left\, he hits you with a sharp right. It kept me on the edge of my seat. I think because of its suspense\, as well as new elements that we have not yet seen in Star Wars films\, it is easy to miss a lot of the small subtle details that makes the series wonderful. Upon my second viewing\, I was able to see the wonder that is this film. It is a new direction\, but this is something that must happen for the franchise to continue forward. One of the biggest critiques I kept hearing about The Force Awakens was that it was too much of a mirror to A New Hope. Johnson veers off to create something new\, which is ultimately something great.
